    Deprecated API

    Contents

    • Terminally Deprecated
    • Classes
    • Methods
    • Constructors
    • Terminally Deprecated Elements
      Element
      Description
      org.freedesktop.dbus.connections.AbstractConnection.setWeakReferences(boolean)
      should be set during construction time (using the builder), will be removed in future
      org.freedesktop.dbus.connections.base.AbstractConnectionBase.setDisconnectCallback(IDisconnectCallback)
      should be set on construction using the builder
      org.freedesktop.dbus.connections.impl.BaseConnectionBuilder.withWeakReferences(boolean)
      use BaseConnectionBuilder.withExportWeakReferences(boolean) instead
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMap
      use any other Map implementation like HashMap, LinkedHashMap etc
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule
      use DBusMatchRuleBuilder
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule(Class<?>)
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule(Class<?>, String, String)
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule(Class<? extends DBusInterface>, String)
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule(String, String, String)
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule(String, String, String, String)
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule(String, String, String, String, String)
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule(DBusExecutionException)
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule(Message)
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule.getCachedSignalType(String)
      use DBusMatchRule.getCachedSignalType(String)
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule.getObject()
      use DBusMatchRule.getPath()
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule.getSource()
      use DBusMatchRule.getSender()
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule.matches(DBusMatchRule, boolean)
      using a MatchRule to match against a MatchRule makes no sense, therefore this method will be removed without any replacement
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusPath.setPath(String)
      path will be final in future, please do no longer use the setter.
      org.freedesktop.dbus.exceptions.DBusExecutionException.getType()
      type is never used
      org.freedesktop.dbus.exceptions.DBusExecutionException.setType(String)
      the configured type is never used
      org.freedesktop.dbus.messages.constants.MessageType
      use MessageTypes instead
      org.freedesktop.dbus.ObjectPath
      please use DBusPath instead
    • Deprecated Classes
      Class
      Description
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMap
      use any other Map implementation like HashMap, LinkedHashMap etc
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule
      use DBusMatchRuleBuilder
      org.freedesktop.dbus.messages.constants.MessageType
      use MessageTypes instead
      org.freedesktop.dbus.ObjectPath
      please use DBusPath instead
    • Deprecated Methods
      Method
      Description
      org.freedesktop.dbus.ArrayFrob.getPrimitiveToWrapperTypes()
      use PrimitiveUtils.getPrimitiveToWrapperTypes()
      org.freedesktop.dbus.ArrayFrob.getWrapperToPrimitiveTypes()
      use PrimitiveUtils.getWrapperToPrimitiveTypes()
      org.freedesktop.dbus.connections.AbstractConnection.setWeakReferences(boolean)
      should be set during construction time (using the builder), will be removed in future
      org.freedesktop.dbus.connections.base.AbstractConnectionBase.setDisconnectCallback(IDisconnectCallback)
      should be set on construction using the builder
      org.freedesktop.dbus.connections.impl.BaseConnectionBuilder.withWeakReferences(boolean)
      use BaseConnectionBuilder.withExportWeakReferences(boolean) instead
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule.getCachedSignalType(String)
      use DBusMatchRule.getCachedSignalType(String)
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule.getObject()
      use DBusMatchRule.getPath()
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule.getSource()
      use DBusMatchRule.getSender()
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule.matches(DBusMatchRule, boolean)
      using a MatchRule to match against a MatchRule makes no sense, therefore this method will be removed without any replacement
      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusPath.setPath(String)
      path will be final in future, please do no longer use the setter.
      org.freedesktop.dbus.exceptions.DBusExecutionException.getType()
      type is never used
      org.freedesktop.dbus.exceptions.DBusExecutionException.setType(String)
      the configured type is never used

      Description

      org.freedesktop.dbus.DBusMatchRule(Message)
